name: brightbyte-blockchain
description: Implementation of the BrightByte Blockchain contracts. Uses Truffle.

scripts.start: yarn run ganache:quite & (yarn run wait:ganache && yarn run truffle:migrate)
scripts.posttruffle:migrate: yarn run update:contractsAddresses; yarn run copy:contracts
scripts.posttruffle:custom-deploy: yarn run update:contractsAddresses; yarn run copy:contracts
scripts.posttruffle:besu: yarn run update:contractsAddresses; yarn run copy:contracts
scripts.truffle:deploy:test: concurrently -ks first "yarn run wait:ganache && yarn run truffle:test" "yarn run ganache:quite"
scripts.truffle:deploy: concurrently -ks first "yarn run wait:ganache && yarn run truffle:migrate" "yarn run ganache:quite"

author: Tribalyte Technologies
